extends java.lang.Object
    FirebaseController.java Handles firebase-related functionality

      void acceptFollowRequest(User user, BooleanCallback callback)
      acceptFollowRequest Method for updating firebase with the information that the logged in user has accepted a follow request from a certain user, updating the following collection of the requesting user, and the followers collection of the currently logged in user accordingly

      declineFollowRequest Method for updating firebase with the information that a certain incoming follow request was denied, removing the currently logged in user from the requesting user's following list

        Parameters:
        mood - Mood - The mood related to the image, for filename setting
        bitmap - Bitmap - Bitmap of the image in question
        callback - BooleanCallback - A boolean callback to indicate success or failure of the add to DB

                        GetMoodCallback callback)

        Parameters:
        mood - Mood - the mood whose information we're querying
        callback - GetMoodCallback - a mood callback to be called with the mood we're requesting

      • refreshUserMoods

        public void refreshUserMoods(GetMoodsCallback callback)
        refreshUserMoods Method that gets all the current user's moods from firebase
        Parameters:
        callback - GetMoodsCallback - Moods callback that will be called with an ArrayList of all the user's moods

      • refreshOtherUserMoods

                                  GetMoodsCallback callback)
        refreshOtherUserMoods Method that gets a specific user's moods
        Parameters:
        user - User - The user whose mood's we want
        callback - GetMoodsCallback - A moods callback that will be called with the specified user's moods

      • getUsers

        public void getUsers(GetUsersCallback callback)
        getUsers Get a list of all users not including the currently logged in user from firebase
        Parameters:
        callback - GetUsersCallback - A user callback that will be called with an ArrayList of all users except the currently logged in user

                            BooleanCallback callback)
        requestToFollow Method that sends a follow request to another user through firebase
        Parameters:
        user - User - The user to send the follow request to
        callback - BooleanCallback - a boolean callback that indicates success or failure

      • declineFollowRequest

        public void declineFollowRequest(User user,
                                 BooleanCallback callback)
        declineFollowRequest Method for updating firebase with the information that a certain incoming follow request was denied, removing the currently logged in user from the requesting user's following list
        Parameters:
        user - User - The user's whose follow request is being denied
        callback - BooleanCallback - a boolean callback indicating success or failure

      • acceptFollowRequest

        public void acceptFollowRequest(User user,
                                BooleanCallback callback)
        acceptFollowRequest Method for updating firebase with the information that the logged in user has accepted a follow request from a certain user, updating the following collection of the requesting user, and the followers collection of the currently logged in user accordingly
        Parameters:
        user - User - The user whose follow request is being accepted
        callback - BooleanCallback - a boolean callback indicating success or failure

      • unfollowUser

        public void unfollowUser(User user,
                         BooleanCallback callback)
        unfollowUser A method for updating firebase with the information that the currently logged in user has unfollowed a certain user.
        Parameters:
        user - User - The user who is being unfollowed
        callback - BooleanCallback - A boolean callback indicating success or failure
